channel.title: Need list of Colors
channel.description:
i have jsut started working on 508s+ and i need help finding a list for the colors
ex.
sendMessage(p, "[b]<col=00FF00>[/b]Welcome i know is the color code
can i have a list of the codes for the different colors? or a link to one please?
